Topic.Title: Quest throws error when starting up after installation

Posts.EditableText: Quest throws error when starting up after installation, how can i fix this?
Posts.HTML: Quest throws error when starting up after installation, how can i fix this?

Posts.EditableText: What type of error is it?

0xc00000e5 error, it says 
"The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00000e5)
Click OK to close the applicaton."
Posts.HTML:
0xc00000e5 error, it says
"The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00000e5)
Click OK to close the applicaton."

Posts.EditableText: Do you use Windows, Mac, or Linux?
Posts.HTML: Do you use Windows, Mac, or Linux?

Posts.EditableText:
I think you either wait for it, or there is a problem with your own computer.

Have you tried to download Quest 5.8? Each game must be played with the Quest program.
Posts.HTML:
I think you either wait for it, or there is a problem with your own computer.

Have you tried to download Quest 5.8? Each game must be played with the Quest program.

Posts.EditableText:
Possible solutions (based on things that have worked for other people who posted similar issues):

* **Download corrupted** - Uninstall, download the installer again, reinstall.
* **Something wrong with .NET** - Install the latest version of the .NET framework, uninstall and reinstall Quest
Posts.HTML:
Possible solutions (based on things that have worked for other people who posted similar issues):

  • Download corrupted - Uninstall, download the installer again, reinstall.
  • Something wrong with .NET - Install the latest version of the .NET framework, uninstall and reinstall Quest
